Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt and Halsted: near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt, Halsted and over regular route, due to a parade near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak buses Temporary Westbound Reroute near 54th Pink Line
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak  buses are temp rerouted via Bypassing 54th Pink Line Terminal then resume their normal route, due to a Festival near 54th Pink Line

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Bypassing 54th Pink Line Terminal then resume their normal route, due to a Festival near 54th Pink Line.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red and Brown Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription: Red and Brown Line Service Delayed at Armitage due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Brown Line Service delayed at Armitage due to fire department activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
